EmailTemplate.name: Comm3 Support E-Mail-To-Case Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Comm3 Support Case:{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}: {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting your support request online. Case #: {!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created
and we will contact you as soon as possible.
Thank You,
Comm3.Net Customer Support
